Dirk Nowitzki

Pronunciation: \Na-VIT-skee\

Dirk Werner Nowitzki

(Dirty, Tall Baller from the G, German Race Car, German Jesus)

Position: Power Forward and Center ▪ Shoots: Right

7-0, 245lb (213cm, 111kg)

Born: June 19, 1978 in Wurzburg, Germany de

High School: Rontgen Gymnasium in Wurzburg, Germany

Draft: Milwaukee Bucks, 1st round (9th pick, 9th overall), 1998 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: February 5, 1999

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2023 (Full List)

Career Length: 21 years

  • Hall of Fame
  • 14x All Star
  • 2011 NBA Champ
  • 12x All-NBA
  • 2006-07 MVP
  • 2010-11 Finals MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Dirk Nowitzki?

Dirk Nowitzki is 46 years old.

Where was Dirk Nowitzki born?

Dirk Nowitzki was born in Wurzburg, Germany.

When was Dirk Nowitzki born?

Dirk Nowitzki was born on June 19, 1978.

How tall is Dirk Nowitzki?

Dirk Nowitzki is 7-0 (213 cm) tall.

How much did Dirk Nowitzki weigh when playing?

Dirk Nowitzki weighed 245 lbs (111 kg) when playing.

Is Dirk Nowitzki in the Hall of Fame?

Dirk Nowitzki was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2023 (Full List) .

When was Dirk Nowitzki drafted?

Dirk Nowitzki was drafted by Milwaukee Bucks, 1st round (9th pick, 9th overall), 1998 NBA Draft.

What position did Dirk Nowitzki play?

Power Forward and Center.

When did Dirk Nowitzki retire?

Dirk Nowitzki last played in 2019.

What is Dirk Nowitzki's net worth?

Dirk Nowitzki made at least $255,371,801 playing professional basketball.

How much did Dirk Nowitzki make?

Dirk Nowitzki made $25,000,000 in 2017.

What did Dirk Nowitzki average?

Dirk Nowitzki averaged 20.7 points, 7.5 rebounds, and 2.4 assists per game.

How many rings does Dirk Nowitzki have?

Dirk Nowitzki won one championship.

What is Dirk Nowitzki's Twitter account?

Dirk Nowitzki is on Twitter at swish41.

What schools did Dirk Nowitzki attend?

Dirk Nowitzki attended Rontgen Gymnasium in Wurzburg, Germany.

What are Dirk Nowitzki's nicknames?

Dirty, Tall Baller from the G, German Race Car, German Jesus are nicknames for Dirk Nowitzki.
